summary: Bulk upload flow in BulkUploadSection appears refactored to rely on the currently authenticated Internet Identity (no user list / placeholder principal visible in the shown portion). However, the diff summary does not provide concrete evidence that the React Query bulkCreateTasks hook typing/payload was updated to make owner optional. The component also introduces accepting Excel file extensions, which was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the frontend bulk-create React Query hook typing and payload shape (frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts) so that bulkCreateTasks does not require an explicit owner Principal from the CSV upload code path, and can pass "no owner specified" to the backend to default to the caller.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff content does not include the actual changes to frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts (only a high-level summary in frontend-file-summaries.txt), so there is no direct evidence that the mutation payload typing/shape was changed to make owner optional/omittable and that BulkUploadSection uses that new shape.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions useQueries.ts in prose only; no code diff shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Bulk upload file picker now accepts Excel file extensions (.xlsx/.xls) in addition to CSV.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest and acceptance criteria are specifically about fixing CSV bulk upload ownership/principal handling; adding Excel upload support is not requested.
